body: Why do people hate this, this is clearly a masterpiece
What a piece of shit series.  You people who get off on this clearly need some help.  Any real man would see this for the trash it is.  Any cheating wife deserves death.  What poor writing.
@AkitoH .... i really do feel the same way. Everyone acting stupid and not like a usual person would in these common NTR tropes

@MatsuRain I believed she was a female for a while due to the name, Airi. I don't know any Japanese male with the name or handle "Airi". It's a feminine name. That, and also her Pixiv account says her gender is female, which I saw about a week ago, which confirmed it for me.
@AkitoH I've been following Katsura's twitter account for more than 1 year now, but i never knew Katsura was female

Wonder how long this story will go on for. Feels like it's been years. Katsura's art is great, but her stories tend to be very annoying, and void of common sense, as with most NTR, save maybe one of them. Mika's husband is painfully oblivious and quite frankly, stupid. Any normal person would contact their spouse and tell them that company is staying the night. Follow that up with the fact that Ichinose is always in the right place at the right time, every single time when Mika is there. TL;DR, its a story where everything has to and typically does go right for the hunter and go wrong for the hunted. Everyone's incompetent but him, which makes it an annoying read. Very fappable though. Katsura's scenes are top tier.
another ones with stories like this? I know it's dumb but I like it LOL
Not often that they make these kind of guys actually attractive, which is a nice change
the story it's so fucking stupid...
cry some more vanillacucks, your tears bring me joy
Not being satisfied by the guy she claims to love...just shows she doesn't actually love him...or the author doesn't know how emotions and sexual pleasure interact... :/
